A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible horrible plot! No real character development\, poor Luke was treated with such disrespect. I have been waiting forever to see him back on the cinema screen only to be so disappointed! I have been wanting to see Leia use some force powers\, but maybe be superman (or superwoman)...\"That's not how the Force works!\"...all the sudden Rey is this all powerful Jedi with no training or real sacrifice on her part. Fin and Poe both take back seat to Rey-lo arc. I wouldn't have minded Luke dying in Episode 9 or if they had given him more screen time in Episode 8 training Rey\, but the way they did it here was just horrible!
